FuncDef: Show the configuration and status information for an OAM Performance Monitoring session.
CLIs: session <session-name> [ all | base | bin-group | event-mon | meas-interval ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the session name up to 32 characters.
Specifies the base configuration option for the session.
Specifies the associated bin group and its attributes.
Configures event monitoring and last TCA.
Configures event monitoring and last TCA.
